Mysterious Letter:
One blessed with a power long hidden...misguided is your delight to awaken to a world free of the yoke of the gods, for your awakening will prove to be a new yoke in itself.
Only with your own strength may you cast away that yoke again...follow the lead of one who is bound to you by the Red Thread of Fate.
The Clearest Water, The Brightest Light, The Purest Soul, The Fiercest Flame, The Fondest Heart
- collect these all, and bring them to the Place of Fondest Memories.
Take the Red Thread of Fate in your hands, and set off to find the Clearest Water. Go to Eva's Temple in Heine and ask High Priestess Morelyn for directions.
